revision.comment: Guerrero Nahuatl: correct misformatted language section divider at end
revision.text: ==Central Nahuatl== ===Noun=== {{head|nhn|noun}} # [[bean]]. [[Category:Cholula Central Nahuatl]] [[Category:Tlaxcala Central Nahuatl]] {{c|nhn|Cereals}} ---- ==Classical Nahuatl== ===Noun=== {{head|nci|noun}} # {{alternative spelling of|nci|iyetl}} ---- ==Guerrero Nahuatl== ===Noun=== {{head|ngu|noun}} # [[bean]] ===References=== * Aburto M., Pascual (2003); [http://www.vcn.bc.ca/prisons/nah-guerrer.pdf ''Tiuelis titlajtlajtos Náhuatl'' Puede hablar el Náhuatl], Náhuatl de Guerrero y español, Instituto Lingüístico de Verano AC (SIL); ILV segunda edición, Tlalpan, Mexico City. Mexico. ---- ==Morelos Nahuatl== ===Noun=== {{head|nhm|noun}} # [[bean]] ===References=== * {{cite-book|author=Instituto Lingüístico de Verano, A.C.|authorlink=Instituto Lingüístico de Verano (Mexico)|chapter=Non tlenon tikitaj tlakpak|title=Pequeño diccionario ilustrado: Náhuatl de Cuentepec, Morelos|url=https://www.sil.org/resources/archives/12750|edition=segunda edición|location=Tlalpan, D.F., México|publisher=Instituto Lingüístico de Verano, A.C.|year=2005|year_published=2006|page=21}} ---- ==Northern Puebla Nahuatl== ===Etymology=== Cf. {{cog|nci|etl}}. ===Noun=== {{head|ncj|noun}} # {{l|en|bean}} ===References=== * {{R:Brockway et al. 2018|page=252}}
